text: Worɓe ɓen ko ñiiɓuɓe [e daŋkiitagol] rewɓe ɓen, sabu ko Alla Ɓurniri kon yoga maɓɓe e hoore yoga, e sabu kon ko wintii e jawle maɓɓe. [rewɓe] moƴƴuɓe ɓen, ko yaŋkiniiɓe reenotooɓe ka wirnii, sabu kon ko Alla Reenini ɓe.Ɓen [rewɓe] ɓe huloton dartagol(cuwtagol) mun : waajeeɓe, feronɓe ka ndaɗɗudiiji, piyonɓe. Si ɓe ɗoftike on, wata on aɓɓir e dow maɓɓe laawol ! Pellet, Alla Laatike Toowuɗo, Mawɗo
